verses.name: Isaiah 57:1
verses.text: The righteous perisheth, and no man layeth it to heart: and merciful men are taken away, none considering that the righteous is taken away from the evil to come.

verses.name: Isaiah 57:2
verses.text: He shall enter into peace: they shall rest in their beds, each one walking in his uprightness.

verses.name: Isaiah 57:3
verses.text: But draw near hither, ye sons of the sorceress, the seed of the adulterer and the whore.

verses.name: Isaiah 57:4
verses.text: Against whom do ye sport yourselves? against whom make ye a wide mouth, and draw out the tongue? are ye not children of transgression, a seed of falsehood,
